meanings.definition: Relating to the geographical distribution of plants.
meanings.sent1: The phytogeographic map showed where different plants grow.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use phytogeographic data to understand plant habitats.
meanings.sent3: The phytogeographic patterns in the forest made the botanist chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a phytogeographic landscape, with thoughts blooming like flowers.
meanings.sent5: The phytogeographic diversity of the garden was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The study of the geographic distribution of plants.
meanings.sent1: Learning about phytogeographic helps us understand plant habitats.
meanings.sent2: The phytogeographic of a region can reveal its unique plant life.
meanings.sent3: The phytogeographic class was both informative and fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, phytogeographic is like a treasure map.
meanings.sent5: Exploring phytogeographic opens up a whole new world of botanical knowledge.

meanings.definition: A phytogeographic region is a geographic area with a specific plant community.
meanings.sent1: The phytogeographic region in the valley was rich in diverse plants.
meanings.sent2: Each phytogeographic region has its own unique plant species.
meanings.sent3: The phytogeographic region was like a botanical neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The phytogeographic region was a tapestry of interconnected plant life.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the phytogeographic region felt like stepping into a plant paradise.
